data.title: Letterboxd's Top 250 Horror Films
data.meta_description: A list of 250 films compiled on Letterboxd, including The Thing (1982), The Silence of the Lambs (1991), Psycho (1960), Alien (1979) and The Cremator (1969). About this list: An accompaniment to the Letterboxd Top 250, which sadly contains very few horror films. These are the horror films on Letterboxd with the highest average rating. Extracted from here. No shorts, no TV series, no TV movies, no YouTube videos, no filmed stage productions, no reissues, no re-edits of existing footage, no trailer compilations, no student films, no lost movies, no music videos / visual albums, no behind-the-scenes documentaries, nor anything else that isn't really a full film. All entries must be at least 40 minutes in length. Direct-to-video releases are eligible, provided they are over 60 minutes in length. To ensure this list isn't filled with films with very few ratings, this only includes films rated by at least 5,000 users and with at least 100 likes. There is also a list of the top 50 horror films with under 5,000 ratings. To avoid arguments, the films must be categorised as "Horror" by Letterboxd. Last update: 6th August 2024 See also: - Letterboxd's 1000 highest rated horror films (Halloween 2023) - every film to ever appear on the Horror Top 250 - Letterboxd's Top 50 Horror TV Movies - Letterboxd's Top 50 Horror Comedies - Letterboxd's Bottom 250 Horror Films - Letterboxd's Top 250 Science Fiction Films - Letterboxd's Official List Network - my personal favourite 250 horror movies Some Statistics: Films per decade: 1910s - 1 film 1920s - 10 films 1930s - 10 films 1940s - 7 films 1950s - 7 films 1960s - 30 films 1970s - 40 films 1980s - 40 films 1990s - 28 films 2000s - 27 films 2010s - 36 films 2020s - 14 films Recurring Directors: 6 films - Dario Argento 4 films - Takashi Miike, George A. Romero, Kiyoshi Kurosawa, David Cronenberg, Brian De Palma 3 films - John Carpenter, Sam Raimi, James Whale, Jacques Tourneur, Roman Polanski, Alfred Hitchcock, David Lynch, Mario Bava, Andrzej Żuławski, Jordan Peele, Sion Sono, Shusuke Kaneko 2 films - Robert Aldrich, Alejandro Amenábar, Wes Craven, Kim Jee-woon, F.W. Murnau, Kaneto Shindō, Ari Aster, Tod Browning, Julia Ducournau, Luca Guadagnino, José Mojica Marins, Nobuhiko Obayashi, Robert Eggers, Juraj Herz, Shinya Tsukamoto, Michael Haneke, Robert Wise, Park Chan-wook
data.text:
An accompaniment to the Letterboxd Top 250, which sadly contains very few horror films. These are the horror films on Letterboxd with the highest average rating.

Extracted from here.

No shorts, no TV series, no TV movies, no YouTube videos, no filmed stage productions, no reissues, no re-edits of existing footage, no trailer compilations, no student films, no lost movies, no music videos / visual albums, no behind-the-scenes documentaries, nor anything else that isn't really a full film. All entries must be at least 40 minutes in length. Direct-to-video releases are eligible, provided they are over 60 minutes in length.

An accompaniment to the Letterboxd Top 250, which sadly contains very few horror films. These are the horror films on Letterboxd with the highest average rating.

Extracted from here.

No shorts, no TV series, no TV movies, no YouTube videos, no filmed stage productions, no reissues, no re-edits of existing footage, no trailer compilations, no student films, no lost movies, no music videos / visual albums, no behind-the-scenes documentaries, nor anything else that isn't really a full film. All entries must be at least 40 minutes in length. Direct-to-video releases are eligible, provided they are over 60 minutes in length.

To ensure this list isn't filled with films with very few ratings, this only includes films rated by at least 5,000 users and with at least 100 likes. There is also a list of the top 50 horror films with under 5,000 ratings.

To avoid arguments, the films must be categorised as "Horror" by Letterboxd.

Last update: 6th August 2024

See also:

- Letterboxd's 1000 highest rated horror films (Halloween 2023)

- every film to ever appear on the Horror Top 250

- Letterboxd's Top 50 Horror TV Movies

- Letterboxd's Top 50 Horror Comedies

- Letterboxd's Bottom 250 Horror Films

- Letterboxd's Top 250 Science Fiction Films

- Letterboxd's Official List Network

- my personal favourite 250 horror movies

Some Statistics:

Films per decade:

1910s - 1 film

1920s - 10 films

1930s - 10 films

1940s - 7 films

1950s - 7 films

1960s - 30 films

1970s - 40 films

1980s - 40 films

1990s - 28 films

2000s - 27 films

2010s - 36 films

2020s - 14 films

Recurring Directors:

6 films - Dario Argento

4 films - Takashi Miike, George A. Romero, Kiyoshi Kurosawa, David Cronenberg, Brian De Palma

3 films - John Carpenter, Sam Raimi, James Whale, Jacques Tourneur, Roman Polanski, Alfred Hitchcock, David Lynch, Mario Bava, Andrzej Żuławski, Jordan Peele, Sion Sono, Shusuke Kaneko

2 films - Robert Aldrich, Alejandro Amenábar, Wes Craven, Kim Jee-woon, F.W. Murnau, Kaneto Shindō, Ari Aster, Tod Browning, Julia Ducournau, Luca Guadagnino, José Mojica Marins, Nobuhiko Obayashi, Robert Eggers, Juraj Herz, Shinya Tsukamoto, Michael Haneke, Robert Wise, Park Chan-wook
